pr_title: delegate focus requests to panmirror when visual mode active

timeline.bodyText: isVisualModeActivated() is a logical state (should it be active) whereas the actual load state (and presence of the panmirror_ member variable that you access in focus()) is different (i.e. it could be logically "activated" but still in the process of loading, so panmirror_ is null). I think you probably want to wrap this call in ensureVisualModeActive().
timeline.author: jjallaire

replies.author: jjallaire

replies.bodyText: I think we should talk realtime about all of this on Monday. I'll send a schedule item.
replies.author: jjallaire

replies.bodyText: Would it make sense to first check isActivated() and then next ensureVisualModeActivated() so the command is properly registered if we are indeed still loading?
